DOC.brief_summary: This observational , physiology pilot study subject overactive bladder , insomnia normal subject . No study drug give . All subject complete one week sleep diary 3-day bladder diary . After one week , subject meeting eligibility requirement complete single sleep night stay sleep laboratory set . During sleep night stay , subject evaluate use cystometry polysomnography . In morning follow sleep night stay , subject complete sleep questionnaire complete participation study .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Trial Sleep Laboratory Setting Compare Physiology Night Time Bladder Function Subjects With Overactive Bladder ( OAB ) Versus Subjects That Have Insomnia Healthy Normal Subjects
DOC.criteria: Must urinary tract infection Time bed 6.5 9 hour least 5 night per week precede month Usual bed time midnight ( 24:00 hour ) typically vary Â± 1 hour precede month OAB subject OAB symptom > = 3 month Documented detrusor overactivity episode within 6 month Insomnia subject Diagnosis chronic primary insomnia History > 1 month wake 2 time per night awake 60 minute per night least 3 month Diagnosis OAB primary insomnia Diagnosis nocturnal polyuria Diagnosis BPH BMI > = 34
